item.description:
The 45th anniversary of this classic American film.

 

As college graduates everywhere brace themselves for questions about their life plans, what better way to kick back and have some fun than with the 45th Anniversary new film print of The Graduate? Dustin Hoffman broke the mold of the Hollywood leading man when he was cast as the freshly minted grad of a private East Coast college, and his refusal to settle for a pre-planned future made him a star for a new generation. And let’s not forget the juicy triangle at the movie’s heart, featuring Hoffman, the free-spirited Elaine (Katharine Ross), and her infamously seductive mother, Mrs. Robinson (Anne Bancroft). The score features classic songs by Paul Simon and Art Garfunkel. “A MILESTONE IN AMERICAN FILM HISTORY!” – Stanley Kauffmann.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Graduate
